messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is a Pushed roll?
Throwing a lot of items in quick succession hoping one will hit the target
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of failing a Pushed roll?
Failing to hit the target
You are a helpful assistant.
Can multiple missiles be used if there is a distinct risk connected with failure?
Yes, the Keeper might ask for a Pushed roll.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of taking more time to assess the distance?
Taking more time to assess the distance
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of taking a massive run-up?
Taking a massive run-up
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of throwing too hard?
Throwing too hard
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if an insane investigator fails a pushed roll?
They will refuse to let go of the item to be thrown.
You are a helpful assistant.
What factors affect the difficulty level of tracking with Track?
Time passed since the tracks were made, rain, and the type of ground covered.
You are a helpful assistant.
How does the opponent's Stealth skill affect tracking difficulty?
The opponent’s Stealth skill should be used to set the difficulty level.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the regular difficulty level of tracking in the forest under normal conditions?
Tracking an animal or human in the forest under normal (temperate) conditions.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of a hard difficulty level of tracking?
Following a trail that is several (or more) days old.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are some techniques used by investigators to locate tracks?
Backtracking, taking more time to study the area, and walking in increasing spirals.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the consequences of failing a Pushed roll in Sample Consequences of failing a Pushed roll: the tracks?
You are led directly into the path of a hungry bear/lion/cannibal, or you get lost and ambushed or caught in a trap.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if an insane investigator fails a Pushed roll?
The investigator compulsively follows any tracks until they are physically restrained or convinced otherwise.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the tracks the investigator is following?
They are physically restrained or the investigator is convinced otherwise.
You are a helpful assistant.
How are Specializations dealt with?
In one of two ways, as addressed under Skill Specializations on page 54.
You are a helpful assistant.
What type of skills are addressed under Specializations?
Art and Craft, and Science skills.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where are Skill Specializations addressed?
On page 54.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a commonality among the specializations of Fighting, Firearms, Languages, and Survival?
There are much commonalities and transferable skills among the specializations.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do the subdivisions of Firearms compare to each other?
There are more similarities than differences between the subdivisions of Firearms.
You are a helpful assistant.
What skills are transferable from Fighting to other specializations?
Reaction times, judging range, evasions, feints, timing, spotting openings, and knowing where to hit.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do the improvement of one specialization in Fighting, Firearms, Languages, and Survival compare to each other?
The improvement of one specialization has a transferable benefit to all other closely related specialisms.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do the subdivisions of Firearms compare to the subdivisions of other specializations?
There are more similarities than differences between the subdivisions of Firearms.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of a transferable skill from one specialization to another?
Any fighter will use skills from Fighting in other specializations.
